en: National Assembly of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的立法机关，是韩国三权分立宪政体制中的重要组成部分。
description.en: The legislative body of the Republic of Korea, an important component of the country's constitutional system of separation of powers.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，现任韩国国会议长。
description.en: South Korean politician, current Speaker of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的主要政党之一，在第22届国会中是执政党。
description.en: One of the major political parties in South Korea, the ruling party in the 22nd National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的主要政党之一，在第22届国会中是主要的反对党。
description.en: One of the major political parties in South Korea, the main opposition party in the 22nd National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家、政治家，大韩民国首任总统、首任国会议长。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and politician, the first President of the Republic of Korea and the first Speaker of the National Assembly.

en: Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 1919年至1948年间在朝鲜日治时期于中国上海成立的流亡政府。
description.en: An exile government established in Shanghai, China during the Japanese colonial period, active from 1919 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国临时政府的议会，是韩国国会的历史渊源之一。
description.en: The parliament of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea, one of the historical origins of the National Assembly of South Korea.

nodes.id: 大韩民国制宪国会议员选举

zh-cn: 大韩民国制宪国会议员选举

description.zh-cn: 为选举制宪国会议员而举行的选举，是韩国历史上的首次国会选举。
description.en: The election held to elect members of the Constituent Assembly, marking the first parliamentary election in South Korean history.

description.zh-cn: 韩国军事将领、政治家，曾任大韩民国总统，通过军事政变上台。
description.en: A South Korean military general and politician who served as President of the Republic of Korea after seizing power in a military coup.

description.zh-cn: 由朴正熙等人发动的军事政变，导致国会被解散，第三共和国建立。
description.en: A military coup led by Park Chung-hee and others, which resulted in the dissolution of the National Assembly and the establishment of the Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 朴正熙为谋求永久执政而发动的自我政变，解散国会并颁布维新宪法，建立第四共和国。
description.en: A self-coup by Park Chung-hee to secure permanent rule, which involved dissolving the National Assembly and promulgating the Yushin Constitution, establishing the Fourth Republic.

description.zh-cn: 第四共和国时期设立的选举人团，位于国会之上，负责间接选举总统及部分国会议员。
description.en: An electoral college established during the Fourth Republic, superior to the National Assembly, responsible for indirectly electing the president and some members of parliament.

description.zh-cn: 韩国现行的宪政体制，始于1987年的民主化改宪。
description.en: The current constitutional government of South Korea, which began with the democratic constitutional reforms of 1987.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治家，曾任大韩民国总统，是韩国国会历史上任期最长的议员之一，也是最年轻当选的议员。
description.en: A South Korean politician who served as President of the Republic of Korea, one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly, and the youngest member ever elected.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治家，曾任大韩民国总统，其三个儿子也曾担任国会议员。
description.en: A South Korean politician who served as President of the Republic of Korea. His three sons also served as members of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，金大中之子。
description.en: South Korean politician, son of Kim Dae-jung.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，金大中之子。
description.en: South Korean politician, son of Kim Dae-jung.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，金大中之子。
description.en: South Korean politician, son of Kim Dae-jung.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政党，于2025年2月19日与共同民主党等组成政党联盟“结束内乱圆桌会议”。
description.en: A South Korean political party that formed a political coalition called the 'Roundtable Conference to End the Insurrection' with the Democratic Party of Korea and others on February 19, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 禹元植是第22届大韩民国国会的议长。
description.en: Woo Won-shik is the Speaker of the 22nd National Assembly of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 禹元植原属共同民主党，于当选议长后依法暂时注销党籍。
description.en: Woo Won-shik originally belonged to the Democratic Party of Korea but temporarily suspended his party membership according to law after being elected Speaker.

relationships.source: 大韩民国制宪国会议员选举

description.zh-cn: 1948年5月10日举行的首届国会选举产生了198名首届国会议员，并于5月31日召开了首届国会全体会议，标志着国会的正式成立。
description.en: The first parliamentary election held on May 10, 1948, produced 198 members of the first National Assembly, which convened its first plenary session on May 31, marking the official establishment of the Assembly.

position.en: First Speaker of the National Assembly

description.zh-cn: 1948年5月31日，李承晚在首届国会全体会议上被选举为首任国会议长。
description.en: On May 31, 1948, Syngman Rhee was elected as the first Speaker of the National Assembly at its first plenary session.

description.zh-cn: 1948年7月20日，国会在间接选举中选出李承晚为首任韩国总统。
description.en: On July 20, 1948, the National Assembly elected Syngman Rhee as the first President of South Korea in an indirect election.

description.zh-cn: 临时议政院是1919年至1945年间大韩民国临时政府的议会。
description.en: The Provisional Legislative Assembly was the parliament of the Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea from 1919 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 朴正熙发动了五一六军事政变。
description.en: Park Chung-hee led the May 16 coup.

description.zh-cn: 1962年朴正熙发动五一六军事政变后，韩国国会被解散。
description.en: After Park Chung-hee launched the May 16 coup in 1962, the South Korean National Assembly was dissolved.

description.zh-cn: 朴正熙于1972年发动十月维新政变以巩固其权力。
description.en: Park Chung-hee initiated the October Yushin coup in 1972 to consolidate his power.

description.zh-cn: 1972年十月维新政变后，朴正熙再次解散国会，并组建了位于国会之上的统一主体国民会议。
description.en: After the October Yushin coup in 1972, Park Chung-hee dissolved the National Assembly again and established the National Conference for Unification, which was superior to the Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 十月维新后，统一主体国民会议被组建。
description.en: The National Conference for Unification was formed after the October Yushin.

description.zh-cn: 朴正熙亲任统一主体国民会议议长。
description.en: Park Chung-hee personally served as the Chairman of the National Conference for Unification.

description.zh-cn: 在第四共和国时期，统一主体国民会议位于国会之上，并负责选举三分之一的国会议员，削弱了国会的权力。
description.en: During the Fourth Republic, the National Conference for Unification was superior to the National Assembly and was responsible for electing one-third of its members, thus weakening the Assembly's power.

description.zh-cn: 1987年第六共和国改宪后，国会的国政监察权得到恢复，权限和宪政地位得到进一步提高。
description.en: After the constitutional amendment of the Sixth Republic in 1987, the National Assembly's right to inspect state affairs was restored, and its authority and constitutional status were further enhanced.

description.zh-cn: 1987年第六共和国改宪后，总统解散国会的权力被废除。
description.en: After the constitutional amendment of the Sixth Republic in 1987, the president's power to dissolve the National Assembly was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 金泳三是韩国国会历史上担任过9届议员的任期最长者之一，并于1954年以26岁之龄首次当选，成为最年轻议员。
description.en: Kim Young-sam was one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly, serving nine terms. He was first elected in 1954 at the age of 26, becoming the youngest member.

description.zh-cn: 金弘一是金大中的儿子。
description.en: Kim Hong-il is the son of Kim Dae-jung.

description.zh-cn: 金弘业是金大中的儿子。
description.en: Kim Hong-up is the son of Kim Dae-jung.

description.zh-cn: 金弘杰是金大中的儿子。
description.en: Kim Hong-gul is the son of Kim Dae-jung.

description.zh-cn: 共同民主党、祖国革新党等五个政党于2025年2月19日组成名为“结束内乱圆桌会议”的政党联盟。
description.en: On February 19, 2025, the Democratic Party of Korea, the Rebuilding Korea Party, and three other parties formed a political coalition called the 'Roundtable Conference to End the Insurrection'.
